content-text.text:
XumaK becomes a CQ5 Adobe® Authorized Training Center (AATC)

XumaK is primarily focused on supporting both Adobe® customers and partners with their CQ implementations and training needs

_2colheading.description:
January 2012

XumaK is pleased to announce the opening of our CQ5 Adobe® Authorized Training Center in Guatemala City, Guatemala, Central America.

The custom designed classroom is located in our new office space that encompasses the entire 14th floor of The Design Center building in Guatemala City. The Design Center is a new, super modern, mixed-use, office building that hosts 3 restaurants, 15 floors of lease space, underground parking and a secure environment. This location is strategically close to the most important places in the city, 15 minutes from the international airport and 5 minutes from the financial & hotel districts.

As a member of the AATC, XumaK’s CQ5 Adobe® Certified Instructors (ACI) will deliver the CQ5 official courses (Author, Developer & System Administration) in addition to XumaK’s custom CQ5 Workshops (Advance Author, Advance Developer, Advance Administration & Advance Architect).

Since 2003, XumaK has been delivering CQ courses around the world. We are happy and honored to continue working with this product and glad to assist Adobe’s Training Services.

XumaK’s AATC in Guatemala was chosen to best serve students coming from the USA, Latin America & Caribbean and we are always open.

Registration for classes delivered in this location is on a first come, first serve basis and seating is limited to a maximum of 12 students per session.

To inquire about available seats and registration, please CONTACT US at training@XumaK.com or by calling +1.213.232.3366.

--------------------
About XumaK

XumaK is an acknowledged leader in Web Content Management (WCM), Web Experience Management (WEM), mobile solutions and web strategy. An Adobe® Solutions Partner, XumaK is primarily focused on supporting both Adobe® customers and partners with their Adobe CQ implementations and training needs. Through our office in the USA and a near-shore team of professionals based in Guatemala, we deliver cost effective, multi-lingual services to customers and partners located around the world.
